sen.j: 朽木稙元（くつき たねもと）は、丹波国福知山藩の第2代藩主。
sen.e: Tanemoto KUTSUKI was the second lord of Fukuchiyama domain in Tango Province.
Tanemoto KUTSUKI was the second lord of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tango Province.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更、the Fukuchiyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: Tanemoto KUTSUKI was the second lord of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tango Province.
The third load of the Kutsuki family in Fukuchiyama domain.
The third head of the Kutsuki family in the Fukuchiyama Domain.
sen.cmt: load→headに修正、the Fukuchiyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: The third head of the Kutsuki family in the Fukuchiyama Domain.

sen.j: 寛文4年（1664年）3月27日、初代藩主（当時は常陸国土浦藩の第2代藩主）・朽木稙昌の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: Born on March 27, 1664 as the first son of Tanemasa KUTSUKI, the first lord of the domain (then the second lord of Tsuchiura domain in Hitachi Province).
Born on April 23, 1664 as the first son of Tanemasa KUTSUKI, the first lord of the Domain (then the second lord of Tsuchiura Domain in Hitachi Province).
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Born on April 23, 1664 as the first son of Tanemasa KUTSUKI, the first lord of the Domain (then the second lord of Tsuchiura Domain in Hitachi Province).

sen.j: 宝永5年（1708年）6月25日、父の隠居で家督を継いで第2代藩主となり、弟の朽木稙治に3000石を分与した。
sen.e: On June 25, 1708, he took over as head of the family and became the second lord of the domain due to his father's retirement, and gave a territory of 3,000 koku to his younger brother, Taneharu KUTSUKI.

On August 11, 1708, he took over as head of the family and became the second lord of the Domain due to his father's retirement, and gave a territory of 3,000 koku to his younger brother, Taneharu KUTSUKI.
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正、domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: On August 11, 1708, he took over as head of the family and became the second lord of the Domain due to his father's retirement, and gave a territory of 3,000 koku to his younger brother, Taneharu KUTSUKI.

sen.j: 藩政では藩財政の困窮に苦しめられている。
sen.e: He had to deal with the financial stringency of the domain.
He had to deal with the financial stringency of the Domain.
sen.cmt: domainの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: He had to deal with the financial stringency of the Domain.
Died on January 24, 1721.
Died on February 20, 1721.
Died on February 20, 1721.
Died at the age of 58.
Died at the age of 58.
Died at the age of 58.

sen.j: 後を長男の稙綱が継いだ。
sen.e: His first son Tanetsuna succeeded him.
His first son Tanetsuna succeeded him.
His first son Tanetsuna succeeded him.
